title: New: Outfit – Drakes
content:
Despite only being in existence for a matter of months, Liverpool band Outfit seem intent on reinventing their sound with every new track they release.

Whilst the previously heard Dashing In Passing adopted a slick R ‘n’ B approach, new cut Drakes takes a step back ever so slightly, building a more atmospheric yet still brilliantly enticing pop track. Drakes is the first track to be taken from their upcoming EP Another Night’s Dreams Reach Earth Again out 14 May on Double Denim. Check out Drakes below.

Via Abeano
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
